about_the_game:
This is my first app, it finally found it's way to Steam. I put a lot of effort in it, hope you like it :)
The only difference to Android/iOS is that there is no in-game store and no advertisements, this is PC after all!
The game is intended to be played in windowed mode, so you can happily be distracted from whatever productive thing you should be actually doing.

Summary


You are the captain of a space ship and fly through missions to earn money. With the money you can buy parts to build your weapon in your space ship. You can also buy bigger and better ships which can fit more parts. Building a small weapon is straight forward, but later you can build extremely strong weapons if you use the available space wisely.

Features of Miner Gun Builder are:
  • 8 Captains with custom skills
  • 100 handmade missions
  • Infinite procedural created worlds
  • 41 Ships (and custom ships with endless combinations)
  • 51 Achievements
  • 12 Challenges
  • 52 Weapon components
  • 73 skills in the skill-tree
  • Your own alliance you can invite friends into
  • over 1.000.000.000.000 possible weapons !!!

The game is an light-hearted version of an arcade space shooter but has substantial depth regarding the mechanics.

If you like to tinker around and optimize stuff - This is a game for you.

legal_notice:
By buying the software you only receive the right to use the software, for its intended purpose as a game, as provided by the developer, from then on, for yourself.
Everything else is not permitted if not agreed by the developer.
name: Miner Gun Builder

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10, 64-bit versions only.
  • Processor: If it runs windows, it runs this game
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, and DX12-capable GPUs
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: It runs on 8 year old phones ... you should be good
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win10
  • Processor: If it runs Win10, it will run this game
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, and DX12-capable GPUs
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Tested successfully on a 3700x with 6800xt.

short_description: The game is an light-hearted version of an arcade space shooter but has substantial depth regarding the mechanics. If you like to tinker around and optimize stuff - This is the game for you.
